messages.message:
Hey Radhika, the workflow of using mockery to generate mocks from code originating in another module happens in three places in the codebase. I will create a separate PR to ensure we run `make build` before running `go mod tidy` to generate mocks.

Developers will be responsible for ensuring that modules they develop are self sustaining (e.g. ensuring that the `db` module has `stats.pb.go` in the `build` folder.
